SELECT R.VHC_ID , R.VHC_NO , R.CON_ID , C.CON_NM , COUNT(*) AS COUNT_TOTAL , SUM(IF(R.AD_TYPE = 'AV', 1, 0)) AS COUNT_VOICE , SUM(IF(R.AD_TYPE = 'VD' AND R.IMG_PLAY_TM = 0, 1, 0)) AS COUNT_IMAGE , SUM(IF(R.AD_TYPE = 'VD' AND R.IMG_PLAY_TM != 0, 1, 0)) AS COUNT_VIDEO FROM (SELECT A.PLAY_DATE , A.MNG_ID , H.VHC_ID , H.VHC_NO , IFNULL(V.CON_ID, VD.CON_ID) AS CON_ID , IFNULL(DC1.TXT_VAL1, DC2.TXT_VAL1) AS AD_TYPE , VD.IMG_PLAY_TM FROM BM_AD_LOG A LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON A.MNG_ID = D.MNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO H ON D.VHC_ID = H.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VOC_INFO V ON A.ID = V.VOC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VDO_INFO VD ON A.ID = VD.VDO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC1 ON LEFT(A.ID, 2) = DC1.TXT_VAL1 AND DC1.CO_CD = 'VOC_DIV' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC2 ON LEFT(A.ID, 2) = DC2.TXT_VAL1 AND DC2.CO_CD = 'VDO_DIV') R LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CON_INFO C ON R.CON_ID = C.CON_ID WHERE R.CON_ID IS NOT NULL
AND (R.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter}, '%') OR C.CON_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter}, '%') OR C.CON_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter}, '%'))
AND R.PLAY_DATE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{stDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{edDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY MNG_ID, CON_ID ORDER BY VHC_NO ASC
